top_comments.comment: It's always a pleasure dying in your videos
These are getting better and better all the time!
Who would have thought pop-funk would translate to metal so well! The riffage! The three of you together is quite something! Making Phil Collins creepy...Hotel California... just...wow! MORE!
Brought back to this video over and over for equal parts the AMAZING cover they did, but also the creative they put into the video itself <3
"You as the viewer." Yay, I finally made it to the credits of a music video!
